abilities.desc: A violent lust for vital fluids increases Broodmother's attack damage and gives her a vampiric attack.
abilities.name: Insatiable Hunger
abilities.notes: Fully stacks with other sources of lifesteal.

abilities.desc: Spins a large web that grants Broodmother a passive movement speed increase, increases her Turn Rate, and boosts regeneration while in its vicinity, as well as giving free movement. Spin Web charges restore every 30 seconds, with a max of [4, 6, 8, 10] charges. Spin Web can be cast from anywhere as long as the new web touches an existing web. Webs never expire, and can be manually destroyed. When the maximum limit of webs is exceeded, the oldest web disappears. The movement bonus is proportional to the unit's HP
abilities.name: Spin Web
abilities.notes: Grants full movement speed bonus at 100% HP, 0% movement speed bonus at 1HP

abilities.desc: Slows the target enemy, causes them to miss and deals impact damage. Units that attack the target deal bonus magic damage.
abilities.name: Silken Bola

abilities.desc: Broodmother may create up to 5 invisible web lines touching any existing web. Enemy Heroes that cross the web line will spring the trap, becoming rooted, revealed in fog, and take damage over time.  Multiple Heroes can trip on the same line until it's destroyed after being initially triggered.  Broodmother's team is alerted via the minimap when an enemy has triggered the snare.
abilities.name: Spinner's Snare

abilities.desc: Broodmother injects her young into an enemy unit, dealing damage. The spiderlings will hatch if the target is killed while under this influence.
abilities.name: Spawn Spiderlings
abilities.notes: Units killed by Spiderlings will then give birth to Spiderites, smaller and less powerful versions of the Spiderlings.
